task.title: Customer's Note
task.shortdesc: A customer note contains information that you might want to keep track of for a particular customer profile. Notes are visible to store staff only, so your customers won't see them.

step.cmd: From your Shopify admin, go to Customers.
Click the name of the customer profile you want to edit.
Under Customer Note, add or change existing notes in the text box, and click Save.
